snippet.title: Crashlands 2 - Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Crashlands 2 has a release date! April 10 at 10AM PT / 5PM UTC

And even more news: we'll be launching the game on Steam, the App Store, and Google Play at the same time! Crashlands 2 has the same cross-platforminess as in our other games, so you'll be able to swap devices and pick up right where you left off.

Wishlist Crashlands 2 on all your favorite stores:

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401730
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/crashlands-2/id1528199331
- Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bscotch.crashlands2)
